ca.klapstein.baudit.managers

Class BauditDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.klapstein.baudit.managers.BauditDataManager

  • public class BauditDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that interacts with the BauditDataBaseManager (local) and BauditRemoteManager (remote) to keep MVP presenters blind to the fact data may be coming from either a remote or local source.
    See Also:
    BauditDataBaseManager, BauditRemoteManager
